name: Beep Pong
description:
This game is a parody of the classic game Pong. It's a simple yet fun game, perfect for playing in this quarantine and on weekends!

You can play alone or with friends and family.

Controls:

Left side player (blue rectangle):

(W) or (S) key to move

Right side player (red rectange):

Up arrow (^) or Down arrow (v) to move

Functions:

(Esc) or (P) key to pause the game

(M) key mutes and unmutes the game music
